page.title: 06Transport,Gt.Asby
page.content: TRANSPORT Every weekday morning a coach comes to the bus shelter in Great Asby.All secondary school pupils take this coach from Asby to Appleby Grammar School(Asby has its own village school),the bus brings them back at 4.30pm.A lady in Asby ferries the children from outlying dwellings to and from Asby for school.She does the same with the children that go to Asby School(if they live at least 3 miles away).In Great Asby we are very cut off,it is essential to have a car.Quiet alot of people have Range Rovers,and most of the farmers have Landrovers.Apart from a mini bus that comes from Appleby on Saturdays we have no other means of transport.
